examples:
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Was unaware of auto renewal, don’t use canva enough, the money. Perfect to use free version, Please refund immediately, this has overdrawn my account.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware this was set up to auto renew. I no longer use this service and would like a refund

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, 

Please refund me for the canva pro subscription I only wanted to do the free trial I was unaware that I will be charged. Please refund my money this is for account: <EMAIL> thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I do not want to continue the use of my Canva Pro. I was unaware that it automatically subscribed me for the pro account.  I’d like to please be refunded and i understand that my subscription will be cancelled.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware it was going to charge me for a year!!! Please refund. I do not have the money right now. I never use this account! I wanted to try the free trial and it ended up billing me! Please help

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My daughter asked to try this service as a free trial. I have been very ill and was unaware that there was a automatic renewal subscription. I got the notice last evening and was unable to cancel it in time before I was charged. Is there any way to resolve this issue. It looks like a great company, but no one in our home will use it and with being sick, now I simply can't afford the necessary costs. Thank you. Please call if need be... <NUMBER>. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware I had selected a Canva Pro option. I was most likely taking advantage of a free trial. I cannot afford, nor do I utilize Canva enough, a subscription I have to pay for.  Thank you so much.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Sorry I was unaware I had not cancelled my subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please refund this charge asap - I was unaware I had subscribed to this service and have never used it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware I had a subscription to Canva. I haven't used the service since the charge. Please refund and cancel my subscription.

Thanks

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that i have a subscription.  I wasn't notified thet i am going to be charged today. I want the refund and i have already canceled the subscription today.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I believe I deserve a refund as I didn't use Canva but one time and I was unaware that it was going to charge me. I don't want the subscription for this month because I do not use it. I don't think I should be charged due to the lack of using the website and being unaware of the payment. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that I was signing up for a membership, my university recommended I use you guys and that it was free. I cannot afford this charge please refund me the full amount. I thought by signing in with my school account it would be free. Please please refund me I do not have the funds in my account.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware this was being charged to me and I do not remember signing up for this service. Please refund me and cancel this service made to my account.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I was unaware that I was subscribed to the monthly Canva Pro Trial, It automatically newed today 2/4/21 and I would like a refund please. I went ahead and cancelled my subscription but It seems like it was already processed for the month.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware of these charges and I did not sign up for canva pro. Please refund my account. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I was unaware I was on the billing plan - I have not used this service and would like you to refund the charged amount as soon as possible. And please cancel my subscription as well.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware i was subscribed to Canva. I’ve recently been out of work due to the pandemic and this charge caused my account to be over drawn. Please cancel subscription and refund the charge.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have never used these services. I was unaware of the subscription. I was able to have one refunded. here is submittal for remaining three. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Want to discontinue subscription. I was unaware I was subscribed and was going to be charged.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware of the subscription and I would like to cancel the membership and get refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I only used Canva one time and didn't realize it was going to charge me. I don't feel that I should be charged as I didn't use the website as well as I was unaware that it would charge me. I don't want to have the subscription this month either as I will not use it so I feel I deserve a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I was unaware this was automatically renewing. Please could you cancel my subscription and refund the most recent payment? Thank you.
What do you need help with?: I want to cancel my account and receive a refund for charges that I was unaware of

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello,
I was unaware of this charge. I had canceled the subscription before. I kindly ask for a refund. 
Thank you.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Did not use canva for this term. Was unaware of the renewal

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that my canva pro account would renew itself, and I did not want to pay for another month.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unable to get into my paypal account and was unaware i was signed up for automatic charges. I would like to get a refund for all the charges if possible.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I used the free trial and found it somewhat useful but not so much that I will use it often enough to warrant the monthly payment, however it has automatically charged me which I was unaware of, I would appreciate the refund massively as I am a student and do not receive much money anyway.
Thanks for your help and have a great Sunday! 
Morgan McMaster

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Subscription renewed and I was unaware.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware I still had a subscription. I just noticed the charge taken out of my card from my automatic bank account payments.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that I was signed up for Canva Pro. I have not used the premium features and would like a refund.

Refund request reason: I was unaware of this subscription.  PLEASE CANCEL and refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Dear canva team, I was unaware that my card was being used for the free 1 month trial. I haven’t used canva’s services in a long time and it got automatically deducted. Please do refund the amount back to me as I didn’t realise my card was connected. Thank you, greatly appreciate it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, 
I was unaware that I had selected the the annual renewal option. I unfortunately cannot afford this subscription at this time. Is it possible to receive a refund for this? I have not used the features and was unaware of the charge until now. 
Thank you,
Rachel Plankenhorn

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that i had signed up for automatic renewal of the account that I made. I honestly can’t even remember making this account. I have not utilized the site any

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have been unable to log into Canva and have been charged 6 times, can I please request a refund as I have not been able to use this and was unaware i was being charged every month, i previously messaged about this problem and im still getting charged

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that I had signed up for a subscription

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My university signed students up to trial Canva for marketing assignments. I had my card previously uploaded to Canva, but not for this particular subscription. I was unaware I would be charged 119$ and would like to request a full refund, and cancel my subscription if possible.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Dear Sir/Mam, I was unaware of these charges and was trying Canva for free (trail period) you can check my use. Please refund me the amount, this is a significant amount for me.

Refund request reason: Was unable to use the service the entire time I had it because of mechanical issues and was unaware of a charge that was going to overdraft my account without warning 

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware of the automatic renewal, can i please get a refund as i do not use canva that often and havent used it since i was charged

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please refund my monthly subscription that automatically renewed after a free year.  I was unaware and have now canceled it.  This causes a lot of issues with the school account that was billed.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that I was still being charged for this subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, hope you are well :)

I recently got in touch to request a refund as I have only used Canva once and was under the impression that I was using the basic service. I was unaware that payment was being taken every month so I would like to please request a refund and for my account to be canceled. 

I look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,

<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware this was an automatically renewal and I only used your website once. I don't plan on using it anymore.
Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am requesting a subscription payment refund.
I was unaware my subscription would automatically renew. I do not need use of pro features.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Unaware I was being automatically charged. Don’t use canva would like a refund

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: do not want an annual subscription. Was unaware I was going to be charged.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: was unaware of this and got charged  am not even using this. so sorry for the mix up

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware of when my subscription was due to renew. Due to change in financial situation I cannot afford the subscription costs at this time.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware of this subscription

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I would like to be credited for this month.  I was unaware that I was on automatic pay and have not used this program.  Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, hope you are well :)

I recently got in touch to request a refund as I have only used Canva once and was under the impression that I was using the basic service. I was unaware that payment was being taken every month so I would like to please request a refund and for my account to be deleted. 

I look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,

<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, hope you are well :)

I recently got in touch to request a refund as I have only used Canva once and was under the impression that I was using the basic service. I was unaware that payment was being taken every month so I would like to please request a refund and for my account to be deleted. 

I look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,

<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that this was coming out, I do not use it enough to pay that much. Could I please receive a refund.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not sign up for this much money to be taken annually. I was unaware the money left my account it was only brought to my attention when the second annual payment was taken from my account recently

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never use canva. I used it ONCE for a school project, unaware that I was signing up for a pro membership. I don’t even remember putting my card information into the site.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that it was automatically charging me for pro, even though I haven't been using the pro features.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: When I initially signed up, I was informed that I would be reminded before the renewal went through, however I received no notification before the renewal charge so I was unaware that the charge was coming.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware it charged on its own. I did not want to purchase this monthly  only for the free trial.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was unaware that the program renews automatically. We would like to cancel this subscription. We have another <NAME> account with you all and do not need two.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Unaware of this charge and do not need these services. Please cancel anything related to this charge

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never use Canva and I do not need it. I used it ONCE for a school project, unaware that I was signing up for a pro membership. I don’t even remember putting my card information into the site .

Refund request reason: Please cancel, unaware of subscription.
